description.value:
Catches changes to start date that match the current day. Not allowing scheduled flow to capture till next morning run.
Define Flow Logic to set task to "In Progress" for all "Root" tasks for a project. Any task that has no dependencies and is in the lowest order will be set to In Progress state when the project start date is met.
description.display_value:
Catches changes to start date that match the current day. Not allowing scheduled flow to capture till next morning run.
Define Flow Logic to set task to "In Progress" for all "Root" tasks for a project. Any task that has no dependencies and is in the lowest order will be set to In Progress state when the project start date is met.
